src.plot.styleÔÉÅ

Helpers for setting plot style and colors.

src.plot.style.PALETTES = {'avanti': ['FB4142', '94376C', 'CE75AD', '76BDCF', '9DCFF0'], 'crystal_pepsi': ['FFCCFF', 'F1DAFF', 'E3E8FF', 'CCFFFF'], 'hellafresh': ['2f4858', '33658a', '86bbd8', 'f6ae2d', 'f26419'], 'jazzcup': ['392682', '7a3a9a', '3f86bc', '28ada8', '83dde0'], 'macplus': ['1b4247', '09979b', '75d8d5', 'ffc0cb', 'fe7f9d', '65323e'], 'mallsoft': ['fbcff3', 'f7c0bb', 'acd0f4', '8690ff', '30bfdd', '7fd4c1'], 'seapunk': ['532e57', 'a997ab', '7ec488', '569874', '296656'], 'sunset': ['661246', 'ae1357', 'f9247e', 'd7509f', 'f9897b'], 'vaporwave': ['94D0FF', '8795E8', '966bff', 'AD8CFF', 'C774E8', 'c774a9', 'FF6AD5', 'ff6a8b', 'ff8b8b', 'ffa58b', 'ffde8b', 'cdde8b', '8bde8b', '20de8b'], 'vcool': ['FF6AD5', 'C774E8', 'AD8CFF', '8795E8', '94D0FF']}ÔÉÅ

dict: Dictionary of color palettes for matplotlib.

src.plot.style.RCPARAMS = {'axes.facecolor': (0, 0, 0, 0), 'figure.dpi': 300, 'figure.facecolor': 'efe8db', 'lines.linewidth': 0.6, 'xtick.bottom': True, 'ytick.left': True}ÔÉÅ

dict: Dictionary of rcParams for matplotlib.

src.plot.style.TEAM_COLORS = {'ARI': '97233F', 'ATL': 'A71930', 'BAL': '00338D', 'BUF': '00338D', 'CAR': '0085CA', 'CHI': '0B162A', 'CIN': 'FB4F14', 'CLE': 'FB4F14', 'DAL': '002244', 'DEN': 'FB4F14', 'DET': '005A8B', 'GB': '203731', 'HOU': 'A71930', 'IND': '002C5F', 'JAX': '006778', 'KC': 'E31837', 'LA': '002244', 'LAC': '0073CF', 'LV': '000000', 'MIA': '008E97', 'MIN': '4F2683', 'NE': '002244', 'NO': '000000', 'NYG': '0B2265', 'NYJ': '203731', 'PHI': '004953', 'PIT': '000000', 'SEA': '002244', 'SF': 'AA0000', 'TB': 'D50A0A', 'TEN': '002244', 'WAS': '773141'}ÔÉÅ

dict: Dictionary of team colors.

src.plot.style.hex_to_rgb(hex_codes)[source]ÔÉÅ

Convert a list of hex color codes to a list of normed rgb tuples.

Parameters:

hex_codes ‚Äì list of strings Hex color codes.

Returns:

list of tuples RGB values.

src.plot.style.register_colormaps(user_palettes={'avanti': ['FB4142', '94376C', 'CE75AD', '76BDCF', '9DCFF0'], 'crystal_pepsi': ['FFCCFF', 'F1DAFF', 'E3E8FF', 'CCFFFF'], 'hellafresh': ['2f4858', '33658a', '86bbd8', 'f6ae2d', 'f26419'], 'jazzcup': ['392682', '7a3a9a', '3f86bc', '28ada8', '83dde0'], 'macplus': ['1b4247', '09979b', '75d8d5', 'ffc0cb', 'fe7f9d', '65323e'], 'mallsoft': ['fbcff3', 'f7c0bb', 'acd0f4', '8690ff', '30bfdd', '7fd4c1'], 'seapunk': ['532e57', 'a997ab', '7ec488', '569874', '296656'], 'sunset': ['661246', 'ae1357', 'f9247e', 'd7509f', 'f9897b'], 'vaporwave': ['94D0FF', '8795E8', '966bff', 'AD8CFF', 'C774E8', 'c774a9', 'FF6AD5', 'ff6a8b', 'ff8b8b', 'ffa58b', 'ffde8b', 'cdde8b', '8bde8b', '20de8b'], 'vcool': ['FF6AD5', 'C774E8', 'AD8CFF', '8795E8', '94D0FF']})[source]ÔÉÅ

Register a set of hex codes as a matplotlib colormap.

Parameters:

user_palettes ‚Äì dict Dictionary of palettes to register.

Returns:

None

src.plot.style.set_plot_params(font_scale=0.6, user_rcparams={'axes.facecolor': (0, 0, 0, 0), 'figure.dpi': 300, 'figure.facecolor': 'efe8db', 'lines.linewidth': 0.6, 'xtick.bottom': True, 'ytick.left': True})[source]ÔÉÅ

Set plot style and parameters.

Parameters:

  • font_scale ‚Äì float Font scale for plot text.

  • user_rcparams ‚Äì dict Dictionary of rcParams to override.

Returns:

None
